name: Ricks Against Time
description:
**This game is multiplayer, so internet connection is required**

After selecting a ship, there is a 15 second time. Please be patient. If nothing happens, please let one of the developers know, or post a comment.

Made with Unity, this Rick and Morty fan game was made by Daniel Brakke, John Holden and Claudia Kam, with music by Alex Zhazhakyan.

A 2D racing game where the goal is to reach the finish line before any other Rick, you collect various powerups to blast, slowdown or transform other Ricks.
